search.query: sourcetype="access" |where unit_name = "$unit_name$" |stats count BY client_ip|sort - count| head 15 | rename client_ip AS Client_IP | rename count AS "Count of Requests"
sourcetype="access" | where unit_name = "$unit_name$" | eval ip_port = app_ip +":"+ app_port | stats count BY ip_port | head 15| rename ip_port AS "Service"| rename count AS "Count of Requests"
sourcetype="access" |where unit_name = "$unit_name$" | stats count BY host_name | sort - count | head 15 | rename host_name AS "Domain" | rename count AS "Count of Requests"
sourcetype="access" | where unit_name = "$unit_name$" | chart count BY URL | head 10 | rename count AS "Count of Requests"

sourcetype="access" | where unit_name = "$unit_name$" | eval ip_port = app_ip +":"+ app_port | table _time, client_ip, ip_port, method, protocol, host_name, HTTP_Status, URL, bytes_sent, bytes_received, response_type_field, profile_matched_field, protected_field, wf_matched_field, time_taken | rename _time as Time | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %l:%M:%S %p" ctime(Time) | rename client_ip as "Client IP"| rename ip_port as "Service"| rename methos as Method| rename protocol as Protocol| rename host_name as Host| rename HTTP_Status as "HTTP Status"| rename bytes_sent as "Bytes Sent"| rename bytes_received as "Bytes Received" | rename profile_matched_field as "Profile Matched Field" | rename protected_field as "Protected Field" | rename wf_matched_field as "WF Matched Field" | rename time_taken as "Time Taken"
